Package de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Class DrawableTextWithIconCV

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      • android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
        • de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities.DrawableTextWithIconCV
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback
    public class DrawableTextWithIconCV
extends android.graphics.drawable.LayerDrawable
    This class can be used to generate Drawable objects that show texts on their left and icons on their right, surrounded by a rectangle with rounded corners. Objects of this class can be passed as parameters to a constructor of the class AnimatedGuiObjectCV (i.e. AnimatedGuiObjectCV(String name, Drawable drawable, ...)) and then animated.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawableTextWithIconCV

        public DrawableTextWithIconCV​(android.content.Context context,
                              java.lang.String text,
                              android.graphics.Bitmap icon,
                              int minimumWidth,
                              int height,
                              int iconWidth,
                              int strokewidthBorder)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the Drawable shall be displayed. This parameter may be null which, however, will call a deprecated version of the BitmapDrawable constructor and therefore might cause problems.
        text - The text to be displayed
        icon - The icon to be displayed
        minimumWidth - The minimum width of the whole Drawable (will be made wider if text and icon required more space)
        height - The height of the whole Drawable
        iconWidth - The width of the icon within the Drawable
        strokewidthBorder - The width of the surrounding border line (pixels)
